data.message: Thank you for allowing me to connect with family, friends, see and share the joys. Of new beginnings and support of dreams and condolences of one another,  news, encouraging post,  sharing pictures, feeling closer to them away , laughter to carry a on through tagging each other,    feeling closer to family miles away, thanks, you Facebook, ..

replies.message: You're most welcome, Kimberly. We love helping you feel a little closer to your friends and family. -Jordan
